code: import*as axios from'axios';export var instance=axios.create({withCredentials:true,baseURL:'https://social-network.samuraijs.com/api/1.0/',headers:{"API-KEY":"d9c4ba29-f4a9-4d2d-8ba9-f90ead9fae9c"}});export var usersAPI={getUsers:function getUsers(currentPage){var pageSize=arguments.length>1&&arguments[1]!==undefined?arguments[1]:10;return instance.get("users?page=".concat(currentPage,"&count=").concat(pageSize)).then(function(response){return response.data;});},postFollow:function postFollow(id){return instance.post("follow/".concat(id),{}).then(function(response){return response.data;});},deleteFollow:function deleteFollow(id){return instance.delete("follow/".concat(id),{}).then(function(response){return response.data;});},getFollow:function getFollow(id){return instance.get("follow/".concat(id),{}).then(function(response){return response.data;});}};export var authAPI={getAuth:function getAuth(){return instance.get('auth/me').then(function(response){return response.data;});},logIn:function logIn(dataForm){return instance.post('auth/login',{email:dataForm.login,password:dataForm.password,rememberMe:dataForm.rememberMe,captcha:dataForm.captcha}).then(function(response){return response.data;});},logOut:function logOut(){return instance.delete('auth/login').then(function(response){return response.data;});}};export var securityAPI={getCaptcha:function getCaptcha(){return instance.get('security/get-captcha-url').then(function(response){return response.data;});}};export var profileAPI={getProfile:function getProfile(id){return instance.get("profile/".concat(id)).then(function(response){return response;});},getUserStatus:function getUserStatus(id){return instance.get("profile/status/".concat(id)).then(function(response){return response.data;});},updateUserStatus:function updateUserStatus(status){return instance.put('profile/status',{status:status}).then(function(response){return response.data;});},updatePhoto:function updatePhoto(photo){var formData=new FormData();formData.append("image",photo);return instance.put('profile/photo',formData,{headers:{'Content-Type':'multipart/form-data'}}).then(function(response){return response.data;});},saveProfileData:function saveProfileData(profile){return instance.put("profile",profile).then(function(response){return response.data;});}};
